Html.content:
Adding subscription features to a site is made available by the content subscription engine. It distinguishes two main features, that can be used independently of each other:

  • Subscription
  • Visit tracking

Subscription and visit data is stored in database tables created only for this purpose. Subscription facilities need to be configured in template and formatter JSPs. Subscriptions and visits work on the level of resources, not pages or URLs.
